name: Intel Core i7-13700K
description: 13th Gen Intel Core i7 processor, 16 cores (8P+8E), up to 5.4GHz, ideal for high-performance gaming and multitasking.

name: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X
description: AMD Ryzen 7000 series processor, 8 cores / 16 threads, up to 5.0GHz boost clock, optimized for gaming and content creation.

name: Gigabyte Z790 AORUS Elite
description: High-performance Intel Z790 motherboard with DDR5 support, PCIe 5.0, advanced thermal design and enhanced connectivity.

name: ASRock B650M Steel Legend
description: Durable AMD B650 motherboard, DDR5 ready, PCIe 4.0, excellent power design and audio quality for gaming builds.

name: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4080
description: High-end GPU with 16GB GDDR6X memory, top-notch 4K performance and ray tracing capabilities for gaming and creation.

name: AMD Radeon RX 7800 XT
description: Powerful AMD GPU with 16GB GDDR6, excellent 1440p and 4K performance, perfect for gaming and multimedia work.

name: Corsair Vengeance DDR5 32GB 5600MHz
description: Fast DDR5 memory kit optimized for gaming and multitasking, low latency, reliable and stylish design.

name: Crucial P5 Plus 1TB NVMe SSD
description: High-speed PCIe Gen4 NVMe SSD with 1TB capacity, durable and optimized for fast booting and gaming load times.

name: EVGA SuperNOVA 850 G5 PSU
description: Fully modular 80+ Gold PSU, 850W, quiet operation, stable power delivery for high-end gaming and workstation builds.

name: be quiet! Dark Rock Pro 4 Cooler
description: High-performance air cooler, silent operation, excellent thermal design for overclocked CPUs.

name: Logitech G Pro X Superlight Mouse
description: Ultra-lightweight wireless gaming mouse, HERO 25K sensor, perfect for esports and fast-paced games.

name: SteelSeries Apex Pro Keyboard
description: Mechanical gaming keyboard with customizable OmniPoint switches, RGB lighting, and durable aluminum frame.

name: Lian Li PC-O11 Dynamic Case
description: Mid-tower case with tempered glass, excellent airflow, modular interior, perfect for custom water-cooled builds.

name: Fractal Design Meshify C
description: Compact mid-tower case with high airflow, mesh front panel, easy cable management, ideal for gaming setups.

name: SiliconCove Ultimate Gamer Build
description: High-end gaming PC with Intel i7-13700K, RTX 4080, 32GB DDR5, 1TB NVMe, fully tested and ready for 4K gaming.

name: SiliconCove Creator Pro Build
description: Workstation for professionals with AMD Ryzen 9 7800X, RTX 4080, 64GB RAM, 2TB NVMe, optimized for video editing and 3D rendering.
